thread.title: Nigel Farage gets pelted with an egg in spectacular direct hit
thread.title_full: Nigel Farage gets pelted with an egg in spectacular direct hit

author: Sasha Lekach
title: Nigel Farage gets pelted with an egg in spectacular direct hit
text:
It's tough in politics, especially if you're aligned with Donald Trump. Former UK Independence Party leader Nigel Farage learnt that the hard way after he was hit with an egg Monday. 
SEE ALSO: This sign is the new gold standard for political trolling 
The Brexit champion, Trump BFF and British politician was egged by a "youth" who apparently has a good eye, according to reports . The remarkably accurate hit came while he was in Stoke-on-Trent with UKIP leader Paul Nuttall ahead of a campaign event.
A local by-election has been called after a Labour parliament member resigned, leaving his seat up for grabs, bringing Farage and his supporters into town.

The egg smacked into their umbrella.
Image: Christopher Furlong/Getty Images
The egging comes as "parliament" is trending in the U.S. on Twitter. The Speaker of the UK's House of Commons said Monday that Trump wouldn't be allowed to address the country's parliament during his upcoming state visit. 
Countdown to Trump tweeting, "Well, I didn't want to come to your stupid parliament anyway," tossing his locks, and calling May to cry. ðŸ˜­
â€” Sarah Myles (@sjmyles) February 6, 2017 
Also not helping matters: an online petition against Trump's visit has garnered more than 1.8 million signatures. 
As Trump's British-fueled opposition grows, Farage is probably pretty pleased he had that umbrella out at that moment.
